title: ldap: upper right corner user name shows uid instead of name
body:
---update---

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

when accessing owncloud on internal network username in upper right corner is shown. when accessing owncloud from external ip ldap is not allowed from that ip and uid is shown instead of username. (am i making sense?)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### expected behaviour
when using ldap-authentication username in upper right corner (personal menu) should be the long name or short name.

### actual behaviour

it shows the uid

it worked in 5.0.10 (if i remember correctly)

### steps to reproduce
1. bind to mac os x 10.6 ldap
2. login
